name: NekoCharm
description:
Hey, rookie!
You have to go through a series of tests to prove that you are a worthy fighter!
And then prove yourself in the service of the government!

Peculiar properties:
- Funny and unusual gameplay.
- Unique musical accompaniment.
- The game is a representative of the genre " Japanese visual novel "with elements of mini-games"mini-games".
- All characters are animated and look like real!
